metadata.name: The Ride
metadata.description:
As the flagship title of the 12-Gauge line, THE RIDE was conceived to be--both literally and figuratively--a "vehicle" for some of the comics industry's leading talent to spread their wings. That "vehicle" is a 1968 Camaro, the unifying element through these stories of bullets, babes, murder, and mayhem. 

Issue #1 contains the first two action-packed chapters of a four-part story, illustrated by industry legends CULLY HAMNER (RED) and BRIAN STELFREEZE (BATMAN), written by DOUG WAGNER (ICE), and a cover by ADAM HUGHES (WONDER WOMAN).
